Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
The class Game represents the core of the game, describing the status of the current match

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Game()
    Game constructor, sets all the level and spaces back to the default characteristics

      public boolean isFreeToMove​(Worker worker)
      This method controls whether a player is free to move around
      Parameters:
      worker - Worker you want to check on
      Returns:
      The method returns true if the worker is free to move in adjacent cells

    • charonPower

      public boolean charonPower​(Worker myWorker, Worker oppWorker)
      This method performs the necessary game changes for the use of the special power of Charon
      Parameters:
      oppWorker - Opponent player to which the special ability is invoked
      Returns:
      This method returns true if the move has been successful, false otherwise

    • invalidMoveSpace

      public boolean invalidMoveSpace​(Space nextSpace, Space currSpace)
      Checks if the current space is adjacent to the next space
      Parameters:
      nextSpace - the space where the player wants to move
      currSpace - the space where the player is now
      Returns:
      true if the next space is not a valid space where to move

    • invalidSpace

      public boolean invalidSpace​(Space space, Space currSpace)
      Checks if the space is a valid space where to build
      Parameters:
      space - the space where the player wants to build
      currSpace - the space where the player is now
      Returns:
      true if the space is not valid

    • buildSwitch

      public boolean buildSwitch​(Space space, int level, boolean isAtlas)
      Method used to perform the build
      Parameters:
      space - Space where you want to build
      level - Level you want to build
      isAtlas - This parameter indicates whether the Atlas constraint is active
      Returns:
      This method returns true if the move has been successful, false otherwise
